title: Fix registration link and clean up content
author: AliciaGorriaran
details: Updated GitHub Certifications registration link to `https://learn.github.com/credentials`
Added new section for **GitHub Copilot Certification** covering:
Responsible AI, Copilot features, prompt engineering
Removed "Further reading" section and associated FAQ/handbook links
summary:
- Updated GitHub Certifications registration link to `https://learn.github.com/credentials`
- Added new section for **GitHub Copilot Certification** covering:
- Responsible AI, Copilot features, prompt engineering
- AI use cases, testing, privacy
- Removed "Further reading" section and associated FAQ/handbook links
- Simplified post-exam credential description (removed "Credly" specificity)
generated_title: Add GitHub Copilot Certification docs and update registration links

original_description:
The exam registration page was replaced. I updated the link to the new certification registration page. Additionally the FAQ and handbook have been removed so I removed the "further reading" section of this page.
